title: The Ugly Duckling
author: Hans Christian Andersen
audio: https://emsiemhong.github.io/fairy-tale-api/audios/កនជរកទង  Three Little Pigs in Khmer   Khmer Fairy Tales.mp3
summary: The Ugly Duckling is a story about a little bird that doesn't fit in with the rest of the ducks and other animals on the farm. He's teased and ostracized for being different until one day he discovers his true identity as a beautiful swan. It's a tale of self-discovery, acceptance, and the beauty of being true to oneself.
description: The Ugly Duckling is one of Hans Christian Andersen's most famous fairy tales. It teaches children the importance of kindness, empathy, and celebrating differences. The story has been adapted into various forms of media and continues to be cherished by readers of all ages.

title: Cinderella
author: Charles Perrault
audio: https://emsiemhong.github.io/fairy-tale-api/audios/កនជរកទង  Three Little Pigs in Khmer   Khmer Fairy Tales.mp3
summary: Cinderella is a classic fairy tale about a young girl who, despite facing adversity and cruelty from her stepfamily, maintains her kindness and optimism. With the help of her fairy godmother, she attends the royal ball and captures the heart of the prince. But when the clock strikes midnight, she must flee, leaving behind a glass slipper as the only clue to her identity.
description: Charles Perrault's Cinderella is a timeless tale of hope, resilience, and the transformative power of love. It has been retold and reimagined countless times across cultures, inspiring readers with its message of perseverance and inner beauty.

title: Beauty and the Beast
author: Jeanne-Marie Leprince de Beaumont
audio: https://emsiemhong.github.io/fairy-tale-api/audios/កនជរកទង  Three Little Pigs in Khmer   Khmer Fairy Tales.mp3
summary: Beauty and the Beast is a story of true love that transcends appearances. A kind-hearted girl named Belle volunteers to take her father's place as a prisoner in the castle of a fearsome beast. Despite his outward ugliness, Belle discovers the beast's inner goodness and falls in love with him. Through her love, the beast is transformed into a handsome prince, and they live happily ever after.
description: Jeanne-Marie Leprince de Beaumont's Beauty and the Beast is a poignant tale about the power of compassion, empathy, and seeing beyond surface-level appearances. It teaches readers the importance of inner beauty and the redemptive nature of love.

title: Snow White
author: The Brothers Grimm
audio: https://emsiemhong.github.io/fairy-tale-api/audios/កនជរកទង  Three Little Pigs in Khmer   Khmer Fairy Tales.mp3
summary: Snow White is a classic fairy tale about a young princess who is forced to flee into the forest to escape her jealous stepmother, the wicked queen. There, she finds refuge with seven dwarfs who take her in. But the queen's envy knows no bounds, and she disguises herself to poison Snow White with a poisoned apple. Only true love's kiss can awaken Snow White from her death-like slumber, leading to a happily ever after.
description: The Brothers Grimm's Snow White is a timeless tale of jealousy, resilience, and the triumph of good over evil. It has captivated audiences for generations with its magical elements, memorable characters, and enduring themes of love and redemption.

title: Little Red Riding Hood
author: The Brothers Grimm
audio: https://emsiemhong.github.io/fairy-tale-api/audios/កនជរកទង  Three Little Pigs in Khmer   Khmer Fairy Tales.mp3
summary: Little Red Riding Hood is a cautionary tale about the dangers of talking to strangers. A young girl named Little Red Riding Hood is sent by her mother to visit her grandmother and is warned not to stray from the path. However, she encounters a cunning wolf who tricks her into revealing her destination. The wolf races ahead to the grandmother's house, where he eats her and disguises himself in her clothes, waiting to devour Little Red Riding Hood as well. However, a passing woodsman hears her cries for help and rescues her before it's too late.
description: The Brothers Grimm's Little Red Riding Hood is a classic fairy tale that has been adapted and retold in various forms throughout history. It serves as a cautionary tale for children, teaching them to be wary of strangers and to stay on the right path.

With quick thinking and courage, Jack outwits the giant and retrieves treasures to help his family.
description: Jack and the Beanstalk is a timeless tale of bravery, resourcefulness, and the triumph of good over evil. It has been passed down through generations and adapted into various forms of media, captivating audiences with its adventurous spirit and moral lessons.

When a hungry wolf threatens their homes, only the pig with the brick house withstands the wolf's huffing and puffing. The story teaches the importance of hard work, planning, and resilience.
description: The Three Little Pigs is a beloved children's story known for its simple yet powerful message. It has been retold in countless variations and adaptations, captivating young audiences with its humor, suspense, and moral lessons.

title: Hansel and Gretel

summary: Hansel and Gretel is a dark fairy tale about two siblings abandoned in the forest by their parents. They stumble upon a house made of candy, owned by a wicked witch who intends to eat them. Through cleverness and bravery, Hansel and Gretel outsmart the witch and escape to return home with treasures from the witch's house.
description: The Brothers Grimm's Hansel and Gretel is a cautionary tale that explores themes of survival, resourcefulness, and the dangers of greed. It has captivated audiences for centuries with its blend of fantasy, suspense, and moral complexity.

title: The Little Mermaid
author: Hans Christian Andersen

summary: The Little Mermaid is a fairy tale about a young mermaid who falls in love with a human prince and dreams of becoming human herself. She makes a deal with a sea witch to trade her voice for legs but risks losing her chance at happiness when the prince falls in love with another. Despite heartbreak, the little mermaid's selflessness earns her a chance at redemption.
description: Hans Christian Andersen's The Little Mermaid is a poignant tale of sacrifice, unrequited love, and the pursuit of one's dreams. It explores themes of identity, longing, and the complexities of human emotions.

title: The Emperor's New Clothes
author: Hans Christian Andersen
audio: https://emsiemhong.github.io/fairy-tale-api/audios/កនជរកទង  Three Little Pigs in Khmer   Khmer Fairy Tales.mp3
summary: The Emperor's New Clothes is a satirical fairy tale about an emperor who is deceived by two swindlers claiming to weave clothes invisible to those who are unfit for their positions. Though the emperor can't see the clothes, he pretends he can to avoid appearing foolish. It takes the innocence of a child to reveal the truth and expose the swindlers' deception.
description: Hans Christian Andersen's The Emperor's New Clothes is a timeless fable that satirizes human vanity, hypocrisy, and the power of peer pressure. It serves as a reminder to seek truth and not be swayed by appearances.

title: Rapunzel
author: The Brothers Grimm

When a prince discovers Rapunzel's tower and learns her secret, they devise a plan to escape and live happily ever after.
description: The Brothers Grimm's Rapunzel is a timeless tale of love, captivity, and the pursuit of freedom. It explores themes of isolation, resilience, and the transformative power of love.

summary: The Tortoise and the Hare is a fable about a boastful hare who challenges a slow-moving tortoise to a race. Underestimating the tortoise, the hare takes a nap during the race, allowing the tortoise to win through steady progress. The story teaches the value of perseverance and humility.
description: Aesop's The Tortoise and the Hare is a timeless tale that emphasizes the importance of consistency and determination. It serves as a reminder that slow and steady progress often leads to success.

description: The Brothers Grimm's The Fisherman and His Wife is a thought-provoking tale that explores themes of contentment, greed, and the pursuit of happiness. It serves as a reminder to appreciate what one has and to be mindful of the consequences of insatiable desires.

description: The Brothers Grimm's The Brave Little Tailor is a delightful tale that celebrates the triumph of brains over brawn. It teaches readers that even the smallest and most unlikely individuals can achieve greatness through ingenuity and courage.

description: Hans Christian Andersen's The Princess and the Pea is a charming tale that explores themes of authenticity, sensitivity, and the pursuit of true love. It teaches readers the importance of inner qualities over outward appearances.
